body: Your kingdom's leaders are invited to a festival in a neighboring kingdom. If you attend and bring 1d4 BP worth of gifts, for 1 year Society increases by 1, Fame increases by 1 for any check relating to that kingdom, and you gain a +2 bonus on edict checks relating to that kingdom.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Kingdoms And War/Kingdom Turn Sequence/Events/Festive Invitation
name: Festive Invitation
